desc: Opportunity to purchase a very large village property at a great price ;this property is located in the heart of Formentera and represents a great chance to put your own stamp on the property as it is need of full renovation; once renovated this property will give a very good return to any buyer .Set on a plot of some 220m2 and with a build size of 125m2 along with large courtyard and solarium and built on one level ;at present there are 3 bedrooms ;dining room ;large lounge ;kitchen and large bathroom; this property really does represent good value for money .
features: Electricity;Garden Shed;Grills;Mains Water;Patio;Roof Terrace;Views;Wood Burning Fireplace
